abstract: George Washington University hired Tribal Worldwide as its first digital media agency of record, and Anheuser-Busch chose LatinWorks for a Mexican beer campaign.
snippet: George Washington University hired Tribal Worldwide as its first digital media agency of record, and Anheuser-Busch chose LatinWorks for a Mexican beer campaign.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch, St. Louis, part of Anheuser-Busch InBev, chose LatinWorks, Austin, Tex., to create a campaign to introduce Montejo, the company’s first Mexican beer to be sold in the United States. Spending has not been determined.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
